div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 80px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(240, 240, 240); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
